name: RUIN (RuinGame)
description:
RUIN is a 3D action roguelike game developed by 6 students of Jyväskylä University of Applied Sciences (JAMK) and Gradia during the 2021 spring Ticorporate DemoLab course.

RUIN features cel-shaded stylized 3D graphics, real-time combat, random skill system, artifact system and 5 playable rooms, one with a boss.

Every run starts with a skill selection where player chooses 2 out of 5 random skills (not all of them are polished). Player proceeds through rooms by killing all the enemies within the room. In the 4th room there is a random artifact from a pool of 10 different artifacts that all affect the player in various ways. After killing the boss in the 5th room the player will start again from room 1 with all the same skills and the artifacts they have collected, but there will be more enemies.

Artifacts

  • Essence of Kraken, gives the player movement speed and reduces dash cooldown
  • Feather of the Phoenix, revives player upon death, deals damage to surrounding enemies while being revived
  • Leviathan's Hide, blocks some enemy damage
  • Atlantean Trident, gives player extra damage, hitting an enemy will slow them
  • Scythe of the Grim Reaper, gives the player critical strike chance, critical strikes heal the player for a small amount
  • Kappa's Plate, gives the player a small amount of armor
  • Book of the Wise Ones, increases player's max hp by a small amount
  • The Ruined Ring, reduces the cooldown of skills by a small amount
  • Cape of Agility, gives the player a small amount of extra movement speed, after dashing the extra movement speed increases for a short time
  • Rabbit's Foot, a small chance to dodge enemy attacks

Skills

  • Whirlwind - Damages and stuns enemies around the player
  • Blizzard - Damages and slows enemies around the player
  • Stance Change - Damages the player giving them a damage buff for a short duration
  • Teleport - After a very brief charging, teleports player over a medium distance
  • Shield Bash - Dashlike skill that knocks enemies back

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Left Mouse - Attack
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Camera Movement
  • Mouse Wheel - Camera Zoom
  • Q, E - Skills
  • Shift - Dash
  • F - Pick Item
  • Esc - Pause

Gamepad (First key for PS, second for Xbox)

  • Square/X - Attack
  • X/A - Jump/Skill Selection
  • Sticks - Movement/Camera Movement
  • RT - First (Q) Skill
  • LT - Second (E) Skill
  • RB - Dash
  • Circle/B - Pick Item
  • Start - Pause
